data.field:
Who runs PerlMonks?

PerlMonks is run by volunteers. More specifically:

  • The [id://238736] are responsible for the day-to-day upkeep, such as editing nodes, writing documentation, and fixing bugs.
  • [http://www.pair.com|Pair Networks] is graciously providing the hardware and bandwidth as well as keeping it running smoothly.

Back to the [PerlMonks FAQ]
